title: (4347) Architect Designed New 2 Storied House for Sale in Highly Residential, Piliyandala,Kesbawa
details: Architect Designed New 2 Storied House Available for Sale in Highly Residential, Piliyandala Miriswatha, 04 Rooms 3 Bathrooms, Pipeline Water With overhead Tank, Hot Water Pantry Cupboards With Granite tops Remote Control Gate Parking for 3 Vehicles Servant Bathrooms front Landscape Garden. Rs : 188 Negotiable 18.8 Million
